articles.description: Follow live text and radio commentary, score updates and match stats from the first leg of the EFL Cup semi-final between Tottenham and Liverpool.
articles.title: Tottenham vs Liverpool LIVE: Carabao Cup semi-final score, team news, radio commentary & updates

articles.description: West Ham sack manager Julen Lopetegui four days after a 4-1 Premier League defeat at Manchester City.
articles.title: Julen Lopetegui sacked: West Ham manager leaves after just six months in charge

articles.description: Tottenham midfielder Rodrigo Bentancur is taken off on a stretcher just six minutes into Wednesday's Carabao Cup semi-final first leg against Liverpool.
articles.title: Rodrigo Bentancur: Tottenham midfielder taken off on stretcher after injury against Liverpool

articles.description: The US Anti-Doping Agency (Usada) says it "fully supports" the US government's decision to withhold a payment of $3.6m (£2.8m) to the World Anti-Doping Agency (Wada).
articles.title: US Anti-Doping Agency 'fully support's US government withholding World Anti-Doping Agency payment

articles.description: UK Athletics and its former head of sport Keith Davies are charged with manslaughter over the death of Paralympian Abdullah Hayayei.
articles.title: Abdullah Hayayei: UK Athletics and former head of sport Keith Davies charged with manslaughter after Paralympian's death

articles.description: Forwards Dani Olmo and Pau Victor will be allowed to play for Barcelona after the club was granted provisional permission to register the pair by the Spanish national sports council (CSD).
articles.title: Dani Olmo: Barcelona forward granted temporary permission to play

articles.description: NFL pundit Phoebe Schecter on how the Detroit Lions shut down the Minnesota Vikings and why they head into the play-offs knowing this is their shot at Super Bowl glory.
articles.title: NFL play-offs: Wildcard Weekend predictions & Phoebe Schecter on Detroit Lions' Super Bowl hopes

articles.description: National Hockey League side the Los Angeles Kings postpone Wednesday's game against the Calgary Flames at the Crypto.com Arena because of the ongoing wildfires in the region.
articles.title: LA wildfires: LA Kings postpone game with Calgary Flames

articles.description: France's World Cup-winning manager Didier Deschamps says he will step down after the 2026 tournament in the United States, Canada and Mexico.
articles.title: Didier Deschamps: France manager to step down after 2026 World Cup

articles.description: Stuart Attwell becomes the first referee to announce a VAR decision inside a stadium in England during Tottenham's Carabao Cup semi-final first leg win against Liverpool.
articles.title: Stuart Attwell: Referee makes historic VAR announcement in Carabao Cup semi-final
